transcript: A little more selfish and they'd still be here today. And I got this idea of watching them go down. See everything was being destroyed, but there was one new thing that was being creative.

segments.text: A little more selfish and they'd still be here today.
And I got this idea of watching them go down.
See everything was being destroyed, but there was one new thing that was being creative.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: A little more selfish and they'd still be here today.  And I got this idea watching them go down.  See everything was being destroyed but there was one new thing that was being created.
